field.name: faculty
field.title: Faculty
field.description: For other faculties, change the text below.

field.name: department_other
field.title: Department (Other)
field.description: If your department is not listed above, write it here.

field.name: phone
field.title: Contact Phone
field.description: If you like, you can leave this field blank here and fill it manually on the printed form.

field.name: course_prefix
field.title: Course Code Prefix
field.description: The course group part of the course code. For example, if the course code is "BLG123", select "BLG" here. IF THE COURSE CODE PREFIX IS NOT LISTED BELOW, YOU ONLY HAVE TO HAND IN THE PRINTED FORM, YOU DON'T NEED TO SUBMIT THIS FORM.

field.name: course_no
field.title: Course Code No
field.description: The course number part of the course code. For example, if the course code is "BLG123", type "123" here.

field.name: week_slot
field.title: Course Time Slot
field.description: The day of the week and the hours of the course.

field.name: alternative
field.title: Alternative Course
field.description: The code, title and time slot of an alternative course that you can take. This will be considered only if the request for the first course is not accepted.

field.name: explanation
field.title: Explanation
field.description: Explain why you need to enroll in this course.
